sentences.en: A heavy car with a low center of gravity will hug the road.
sentences.cn: 重心低的载重汽车会在路面上平稳行驶.

sentences.en: A rod said to a flame smilingly, " hug me! "
sentences.cn: 木头笑着对火说: 抱我.

sentences.en: Chichi couldn't refrain from giving him a BIG HUG!
sentences.cn: 琪琪恨不得跳到他怀里,给他个热情的拥抱!

sentences.en: Do not an opportunity pass to hug a friend.
sentences.cn: 不要错失拥抱朋友的机会.

sentences.en: He wonderfully cheered up , his dutiful manner vanishing in a great grin and a strong hug.
sentences.cn: 他真是心花怒放, 他本来是尽职任的表态,现在成为咧嘴一笑,和一次紧紧的拥抱.

sentences.en: His mother gave Paul a hug for being a big help.
sentences.cn: 鲍尔妈妈紧紧地拥抱他,因为他帮了个大忙.

sentences.en: I'd like to hug you too, but I have to put the baby down first.
sentences.cn: 我也很想抱你, 但我得先把婴儿放下来.

sentences.en: Inevitably some of the assembly line workers want to come up and hug you.
sentences.cn: 一些在装配线上工作的工人免不了要走过来向你表示亲热.

sentences.en: Mr. Darcy may hug himself.
sentences.cn: 让达西先生去自鸣得意吧.

sentences.en: Nesta greeted the visitors with hugs and kisses.
sentences.cn: 内丝塔和客人拥抱、亲吻，迎接他们的到来

sentences.en: Paul gave me a big hug .
sentences.cn: 保罗热情地拥抱了我。

sentences.en: Paul gave me a big hug.
sentences.cn: 保罗热情地拥抱了我。

sentences.en: She gave her son a hug and put him to bed.
sentences.cn: 她拥抱了一下儿子,然后让他上床睡觉.

sentences.en: She opened her arms and gave me a big hug.
sentences.cn: 她张开双臂，紧紧地拥抱了我。

sentences.en: She went to her daughter and hugged her tightly .
sentences.cn: 她走到女儿身边，紧紧地拥抱她。

sentences.en: To deserve a hug every morning and butterfly kisses at night.
sentences.cn: 这才能佩的上接受每日清晨的拥抱,和夜幕降临的蝴蝶之吻.

sentences.en: We hug our half belief in ghosts.
sentences.cn: 我们对鬼魂半信半疑.

sentences.en: We stood there crying and hugging each other.
sentences.cn: 我们站在那里哭着互相拥抱。

sentences.en: When they love you, hug ang kiss you, then you love them too!
sentences.cn: 当他们拥抱你 、 亲吻你,喜欢你时, 你同时同样也爱着他们!

sentences.en: You tend to niggle at your partner, and get hurt when he doesn't hug you.
sentences.cn: 你往往会对伴侣吹毛求疵，如果他不拥抱你，就感到受了伤害。

words.tran_cn: 拥抱；紧紧搂抱（hug的现在分词）
拥抱；紧抱在一起；挤在一起

phrases.tran_cn: 粗鲁或紧紧得拥抱；[摔跤]熊抱；[金融]接管策略

trans.tran_en: the action of putting your arms around someone and holding them tightly to show love or friendship
